Name: Station-Z
About the game: Station-Z is a Multiplayer/Single-Player FPS zombie shooter set in world war 2 era, players have to fight the endless waves of zombies infiltrating into their safe zone by achieving upgrades and keeping track of ammunition, survive to the highest round you possibly can! OBJECTIVE In Station-Z players must survival the endless wave of incoming infected Soldiers (otherwise known as 'zombies') from random directions infiltrating into safe zone, while also gaining points to achieve defensive/offensive upgrades and expand area to gather intel. to gain points players must kill zombies individually to progress their points meter. SURVIVAL in Station-Z you can only refill your ammunition for a cost of points that gradually increases throughout the waves, players have to precisely keep track of their ammunition by strictly shooting what's benefiting them in return, or else it could be their last breath.
